Text:
I totally agree... unsung is the word, and there's not that many decent fantasy sci-fi sword & sorcery movies out there to begin with.
Cheers...
yes, more metal and leather bras are necessary, it is a sadly misunderstood need
Exactly we need more metal. Manowar style movies FTW. All hail the 80's
Indeed, thanks for posting this. Movie fascinated the heck outta me when I was a tyke!

thanx for this.

plz seed more :)

Damn right, unsung. Were any of you aware that during production this was to be titled Dungeons and Dragons, after the game? But the lisence was either lost or dropped before the film came out? Anyway. Seed this movie thats only a year older than I am. So I can return the favor!
Thanks much for this, best rip of this one I've found, and the soundtrack is a wonderful addition.
Thanks !  One of my all time favourites !
